featured.text: Run by a team of church volunteers, the shop will collect any surplus, good-quality items and store them until they can be redistributed to the people who are needing those particular things.

definition.zh_def: 重新分配，將資源或物品分配給不同的個體或群體。
definition.en_def: To distribute something again or in a different way.
definition.example: The government decided to redistribute the funds to support local communities.
